Class ExceptionMessageMatcher<T extends Exception>

java.lang.Object

      com.googlecode.catchexception.apis.internal.hamcrest.ExceptionMessageMatcher<T>
Type Parameters:
T - an exception subclass
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<T>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public class ExceptionMessageMatcher<T extends Exception>
extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>

Creates a matcher that matches an exception with a certain message.

Author:
rwoo
